title: The Straight Pipes! (Yuri and Jakub)
description:
Yuri and Jakub are the hosts of the YouTube channel "The Straight Pipes." We talk about their million subscriber milestone, their hilarious cheap car challenge, and their favorite recent press cars. 

Watch them! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC86SBFIAgnYL3ll2ZDgmsuA 

Follow them! @thestraightpipes @yuritereshyn

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/rpQcLC8t46U

 

https://www.autotempest.com

https://www.bluechew.com  CODE: tire

https://www.privateinternetaccess.com/tire

https://www.policygenius.com/
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
